## RenderStateSet.apply() method

Applis the render statements to current device

**Signature:**

```typescript
apply(force?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  force | boolean | _(Optional)_ Force applying all render statements |

**Returns:**

void
